name: Showdown at Bone Orchard
description:
You are a petty Deity with aspirations of grandeur. Your servants are Hunters; recruited by you, and paid with blood, coin, and your blessings. They do your bidding, and in return, you promise them power and a little bit of immortality. 

Destroy your opponent's influence by draining their deck.

===

Showdown at Bone Orchard is a short game that depicts the climax of two minor gods fighting. Armed with advanced technology of steam and sinew, groups of Hunters square off in tight environments to do the bidding of their chosen deities.

The game utilizes index cards to track hunters, but no dice; the resolution mechanic is based around a deck of 52 playing cards. One is needed for each player.
